<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This file describes the structures used for instruction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// itineraries, stages, and operand reads/writes.  This is used by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// schedulers to determine instruction stages and latencies.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#ifndef LLVM&#95;MC&#95;MCINSTRITINERARIES&#95;H</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#define LLVM&#95;MC&#95;MCINSTRITINERARIES&#95;H</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/mc/mcschedule-h">llvm/MC/MCSchedule.h</a>&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &lt;algorithm&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &lt;optional&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">namespace </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm">llvm</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">/// These values represent a non-pipelined step in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the execution of an instruction.  Cycles represents the number of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">/// discrete time slots needed to complete the stage.  Units represent</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the choice of functional units that can be used to complete the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// stage.  Eg. IntUnit1, IntUnit2. NextCycles indicates how many</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">/// cycles should elapse from the start of this stage to the start of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the next stage in the itinerary. A value of -1 indicates that the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">/// next stage should start immediately after the current one.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">/// For example:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &#123; 1, x, -1 &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">///      indicates that the stage occupies FU x for 1 cycle and that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">///      the next stage starts immediately after this one.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &#123; 2, x|y, 1 &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">///      indicates that the stage occupies either FU x or FU y for 2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">///      consecutive cycles and that the next stage starts one cycle</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">///      after this stage starts. That is, the stage requirements</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">///      overlap in time.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &#123; 1, x, 0 &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">///      indicates that the stage occupies FU x for 1 cycle and that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">///      the next stage starts in this same cycle. This can be used to</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">///      indicate that the instruction requires multiple stages at the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">///      same time.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">/// FU reservation can be of two different kinds:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">///  - FUs which instruction actually requires</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">///  - FUs which instruction just reserves. Reserved unit is not available for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">///    execution of other instruction. However, several instructions can reserve</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">///    the same unit several times.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Such two types of units reservation is used to model instruction domain</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">/// change stalls, FUs using the same resource (e.g. same register file), etc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">struct </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage">InstrStage</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a0c36089f8d92b1bcb9c0a582d42aa106"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">enum</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a0c36089f8d92b1bcb9c0a582d42aa106">ReservationKinds</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a0c36089f8d92b1bcb9c0a582d42aa106a7774578153e4ca5a7299d1f42395ae6e"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a0c36089f8d92b1bcb9c0a582d42aa106a7774578153e4ca5a7299d1f42395ae6e">Required</a> = 0,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a0c36089f8d92b1bcb9c0a582d42aa106adb675fc15885dfb7a1666cc046ac7ba5"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a0c36089f8d92b1bcb9c0a582d42aa106adb675fc15885dfb7a1666cc046ac7ba5">Reserved</a> = 1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Bitmask representing a set of functional units.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a28207c85d95c7a0d901b2d8dbc37b6e3"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typedef</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a28207c85d95c7a0d901b2d8dbc37b6e3">FuncUnits</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#aa8614d31923c695646f6e53413e25aca"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#aa8614d31923c695646f6e53413e25aca">Cycles&#95;</a>;  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&lt; Length of stage in machine cycles</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a91dae4825b72bebff6c096e43cf4323b"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a28207c85d95c7a0d901b2d8dbc37b6e3">FuncUnits</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a91dae4825b72bebff6c096e43cf4323b">Units&#95;</a>;  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&lt; Choice of functional units</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#af3857eab7c0ff1a4733397f8d0f8b18e"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#af3857eab7c0ff1a4733397f8d0f8b18e">NextCycles&#95;</a>;   </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&lt; Number of machine cycles to next stage</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#af5320a11af396a0abeddfce816e119ac"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#a0c36089f8d92b1bcb9c0a582d42aa106">ReservationKinds</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#af5320a11af396a0abeddfce816e119ac">Kind&#95;</a>; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&lt; Kind of the FU reservation</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns the number of cycles the stage is occupied.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#aebf0765776840275f39418c68660b53a"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage/#aebf0765776840275f39418c68660b53a">getCycles</a>()</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Returns the choice of FUs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Itinerary data supplied by a subtarget to be used by a target.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#ac56cf30888e6ece9481d748dc06eca78">InstrItineraryData</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the last+1 stage of the itinerary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#adb4cf1d46c5e7c0f1f877c2cd4f834a8"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage">InstrStage</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#adb4cf1d46c5e7c0f1f877c2cd4f834a8">endStage</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ItinClassIndx)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the total stage latency of the given class.  The latency is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the maximum completion time for any stage in the itinerary.  If no stages</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// exist, it defaults to one cycle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a51623c0621a7c092ac9210065f861a33"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a51623c0621a7c092ac9210065f861a33">getStageLatency</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ItinClassIndx)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If the target doesn&#39;t provide itinerary information, use a simple</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// non-zero default value for all instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#affe6bc9136f849e9b46fbccf620b3409">isEmpty</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Calculate the maximum completion time for any stage.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a2d68d32ff95cd10b4899c2823ec28e97">Latency</a> = 0, StartCycle = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/instrstage">InstrStage</a> &#42;IS = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a7327da535eb156175c5a9ec7b7fea629">beginStage</a>(ItinClassIndx),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">           &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#adb4cf1d46c5e7c0f1f877c2cd4f834a8">endStage</a>(ItinClassIndx); IS != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>; ++IS) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a2d68d32ff95cd10b4899c2823ec28e97">Latency</a> = std::max(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a2d68d32ff95cd10b4899c2823ec28e97">Latency</a>, StartCycle + IS-&gt;getCycles());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">      StartCycle += IS-&gt;getNextCycles();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a1eb5609345b906d024fbf9e4bc1adc06a2d68d32ff95cd10b4899c2823ec28e97">Latency</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the cycle for the given class and operand. Return std::nullopt if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the information is not available for the operand.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a0fb39c8a77b3091e6a569fe24055e06f"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a0fb39c8a77b3091e6a569fe24055e06f">getOperandCycle</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ItinClassIndx,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">                                          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> OperandIdx)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#affe6bc9136f849e9b46fbccf620b3409">isEmpty</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::nullopt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FirstIdx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#af1bc954cd72ba2c13fd0d00fd47343a9">Itineraries</a>&#91;ItinClassIndx&#93;.FirstOperandCycle;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LastIdx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#af1bc954cd72ba2c13fd0d00fd47343a9">Itineraries</a>&#91;ItinClassIndx&#93;.LastOperandCycle;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((FirstIdx + OperandIdx) &gt;= LastIdx)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::nullopt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#ae7f429bbda07a9bc2cec72092dfd1a97">OperandCycles</a>&#91;FirstIdx + OperandIdx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return true if there is a pipeline forwarding between instructions</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// of itinerary classes DefClass and UseClasses so that value produced by an</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// instruction of itinerary class DefClass, operand index DefIdx can be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// bypassed when it&#39;s read by an instruction of itinerary class UseClass,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// operand index UseIdx.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a94e1f552980744a8937ef75c00232c8d"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a94e1f552980744a8937ef75c00232c8d">hasPipelineForwarding</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DefClass, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DefIdx,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">                             </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UseClass, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UseIdx)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FirstDefIdx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#af1bc954cd72ba2c13fd0d00fd47343a9">Itineraries</a>&#91;DefClass&#93;.FirstOperandCycle;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LastDefIdx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#af1bc954cd72ba2c13fd0d00fd47343a9">Itineraries</a>&#91;DefClass&#93;.LastOperandCycle;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((FirstDefIdx + DefIdx) &gt;= LastDefIdx)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#ac2d1dc9148e002610c21c5644f412eeb">Forwardings</a>&#91;FirstDefIdx + DefIdx&#93; == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FirstUseIdx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#af1bc954cd72ba2c13fd0d00fd47343a9">Itineraries</a>&#91;UseClass&#93;.FirstOperandCycle;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LastUseIdx = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#af1bc954cd72ba2c13fd0d00fd47343a9">Itineraries</a>&#91;UseClass&#93;.LastOperandCycle;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((FirstUseIdx + UseIdx) &gt;= LastUseIdx)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">false</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#ac2d1dc9148e002610c21c5644f412eeb">Forwardings</a>&#91;FirstDefIdx + DefIdx&#93; ==</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#ac2d1dc9148e002610c21c5644f412eeb">Forwardings</a>&#91;FirstUseIdx + UseIdx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute and return the use operand latency of a given itinerary</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// class and operand index if the value is produced by an instruction of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// specified itinerary class and def operand index. Return std::nullopt if</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the information is not available for the operand.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a702e147674b97e4ec87922e263e1ca73"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a702e147674b97e4ec87922e263e1ca73">getOperandLatency</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DefClass, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DefIdx,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal">                                            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UseClass,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">                                            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UseIdx)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#affe6bc9136f849e9b46fbccf620b3409">isEmpty</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::nullopt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; DefCycle = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a0fb39c8a77b3091e6a569fe24055e06f">getOperandCycle</a>(DefClass, DefIdx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::optional&lt;unsigned&gt; UseCycle = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a0fb39c8a77b3091e6a569fe24055e06f">getOperandCycle</a>(UseClass, UseIdx);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!DefCycle || !UseCycle)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::nullopt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (UseCycle &gt; &#42;DefCycle + 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::nullopt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">    UseCycle = &#42;DefCycle - &#42;UseCycle + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (UseCycle &gt; 0u &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a94e1f552980744a8937ef75c00232c8d">hasPipelineForwarding</a>(DefClass, DefIdx, UseClass, UseIdx))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: This assumes one cycle benefit for every pipeline forwarding.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">      UseCycle = &#42;UseCycle - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> UseCycle;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return the number of micro-ops that the given class decodes to.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Return -1 for classes that require dynamic lookup via TargetInstrInfo.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a035351039a05ded742d1958d3d63d92b"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#a035351039a05ded742d1958d3d63d92b">getNumMicroOps</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ItinClassIndx)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#affe6bc9136f849e9b46fbccf620b3409">isEmpty</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instritinerarydata/#af1bc954cd72ba2c13fd0d00fd47343a9">Itineraries</a>&#91;ItinClassIndx&#93;.NumMicroOps;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
